source/include/boost/config/platform/macos.hpp

00001 //  (C) Copyright John Maddock 2001 - 2003. 
00002 //  (C) Copyright Darin Adler 2001 - 2002. 
00003 //  (C) Copyright Bill Kempf 2002. 
00004 //  Use, modification and distribution are subject to the 
00005 //  Boost Software License, Version 1.0. (See accompanying file 
00006 //  LICENSE_1_0.txt or copy at http://www.boost.org/LICENSE_1_0.txt)
00007 
00008 //  See http://www.boost.org for most recent version.
00009 
00010 //  Mac OS specific config options:
00011 
00012 #define BOOST_PLATFORM "Mac OS"
00013 
00014 #if __MACH__ && !defined(_MSL_USING_MSL_C)
00015 
00016 // Using the Mac OS X system BSD-style C library.
00017 
00018 #  define BOOST_NO_CTYPE_FUNCTIONS
00019 #  define BOOST_NO_CWCHAR
00020 #  ifndef BOOST_HAS_UNISTD_H
00021 #    define BOOST_HAS_UNISTD_H
00022 #  endif
00023 // boilerplate code:
00024 #  ifndef TARGET_CARBON
00025 #     include <boost/config/posix_features.hpp>
00026 #  endif
00027 #  ifndef BOOST_HAS_STDINT_H
00028 #     define BOOST_HAS_STDINT_H
00029 #  endif
00030 
00031 //
00032 // BSD runtime has pthreads, sigaction, sched_yield and gettimeofday,
00033 // of these only pthreads are advertised in <unistd.h>, so set the 
00034 // other options explicitly:
00035 //
00036 #  define BOOST_HAS_SCHED_YIELD
00037 #  define BOOST_HAS_GETTIMEOFDAY
00038 #  define BOOST_HAS_SIGACTION
00039 
00040 #  if (__GNUC__ < 3) && !defined( __APPLE_CC__)
00041 
00042 // GCC strange "ignore std" mode works better if you pretend everything
00043 // is in the std namespace, for the most part.
00044 
00045 #    define BOOST_NO_STDC_NAMESPACE
00046 #  endif
00047 
00048 #else
00049 
00050 // Using the MSL C library.
00051 
00052 // We will eventually support threads in non-Carbon builds, but we do
00053 // not support this yet.
00054 #  if TARGET_CARBON
00055 
00056 #    define BOOST_HAS_MPTASKS
00057 
00058 // The MP task implementation of Boost Threads aims to replace MP-unsafe
00059 // parts of the MSL, so we turn on threads unconditionally.
00060 #    define BOOST_HAS_THREADS
00061 
00062 // The remote call manager depends on this.
00063 #    define BOOST_BIND_ENABLE_PASCAL
00064 
00065 #  endif
00066 
00067 #endif
00068 
00069 
00070
